thread.title: ADM Looking to Tap Into Growth in South America, Asia

author: Jacob Bunge
title: ADM Looking to Tap Into Growth in South America, Asia
text:
Archer Daniels Midland Co. wants to push deeper into South America and Asia, the grain traderâ€™s chief executive said, to capitalize on expanding agricultural production and growing populations.
CEO Juan Luciano, in a quarterly earnings call on Tuesday, declined to comment on a potential deal with Bunge Ltd., after The Wall Street Journal last month reported that ADM had made a takeover approach to its smaller rival. Mr. Luciano said ADM remains interested in building bigger crop trading and processing operations in regions... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
